Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Class that is used to setup and handle the Server.
Since:
1.0

    Server()
    Creates a Server with the specified attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Creates a Server with the specified attributes.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer​(java.lang.String inputPort) throws java.io.IOException
      Starts the server with the chosen port. It will be ready to receive client connections.
      Parameters:
      inputPort - Variable that represents the port of the server.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If no connection is established. At any Exception caught, the server should be disconnected.

    • match

      public void match​(int lobbyID, SocketConnection c)
      Handles the connections and eventually starts a new match of a full lobby handling all steps to set it up, thus setting up the remoteViews, the Model and the Controller for the match of the lobby.

      This method is started as the player connects and enters a lobby. It maps the player connection to the correspondent lobby. When a lobby is full the original match method sets up the "waterfall" of steps to initialize the match.

      Parameters:
      lobbyID - Variable that indicates the lobby at issue.
      c - Variable that represents the server-side connection of each player.

    • removeFromLobby

      public void removeFromLobby​(int lobbyID, SocketConnection connection, java.lang.String nickname)
      Removes completely one player at issue from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyID - Variable that indicates the lobby
      connection - Variable that indicates the connection of the player at issue.
      nickname - Variable that represents the nickname of the player at issue.

    • removePlayerName

      public void removePlayerName​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Removes a player's nickname from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Variable that indicates which nickname has been freed from usage.

    • deregisterPlayer

      public void deregisterPlayer​(SocketConnection c)
      Removes a player's connection to the lobby.
      Parameters:
      c - Variable that indicates which connection needs to be cut.

    • deregisterMatch

      public void deregisterMatch​(SocketConnection c)
      Deregisters the match of the connection owner from server and deletes the associated lobby after the game has finished. All players in the match are deregistered.
      Parameters:
      c - Variable that is the connection used by the client at issue.

    • getLobbyHandler

      public LobbyHandler getLobbyHandler()
      Gets the LobbyHandler at issue.
      Returns:
      An object LobbyHandler currently in use.

    • getLobbyController

      public LobbyController getLobbyController()
      Gets the LobbyController at issue.
      Returns:
      An object LobbyController currently in use.
